idea:
Digi waiter is an all in one web-app solution for the restaurants and cafes, as it flawlessly displays their digital menu on customers smartphone. Just by scanning the QR code given on the table.

Digi waiter lowers the workload of restaurant managers, waiters and chefs in the kitchen. It includes everything from digital ordering to digital billing and payments.
name: DigiWaiter

idea:
Young Engineers Club (YEC), an off-spring of Science Kidz is a makerâ€™s community where tech-savvy creative minds and technology enthusiasts get hands-on opportunity to work with a range of latest cutting edge technologies. With dedicated spaces such as 3D Printing Zone, Arduino Raspberry Pi Lab, Laser Cutting Forge, The Lab, The Lego Hive, and more; YEC is every maker and tinkerers dream come true.

Young Engineers Club (YEC) members predominantly consist of the ex-students of Science Kidz who choose to be associated with us, to continue their quest of knowledge and learning in the fields of Science and Technology.
name: YEC LLP

idea:
One of the major challenges that most people in India are having today is, the lack of good quality essential oils, aromatherapy blends and other fragrance products. So we began to think- can we give people good quality essential oils? Can we give an experience to our consumers through our products? Can it somehow be weaved with emotions? can it enhance people's lives and promote healthy lifestyles through aromatherapy?

Thus began the journey of Satianu.

Satianu is an essential oil and fragrance innovation company, which takes pride in offering high quality, pure and natural essential oils, aromatherapy blends, and other fragrance and essential oil products.

Our vision is to make high-quality essential oils and fragrances an integral part of people's everyday rituals, enhancing experiences and bringing about happiness, health, and positivity.

To know more check out our website: www.satianu.com
name: Satianu Fragrances And Essential Oils
